key.name: wave-theme
key.description: Color theme for the waveform visualization bars

key.name: wave-design
key.description: Visual style preset loaded from designs/ directory (gnome, glass, minimal, neon, skeuomorphic, neumorphic, retro, brutalist, material)

key.name: wave-size
key.description: Size variant for the waveform bars: thin, medium, or large

key.name: wave-type
key.description: How the waveform bars animate: default (use design setting), bottom (grow from bottom), center (grow from center), top (grow from top), wave (propagating left-to-right)

key.name: wave-bg-opacity
key.description: Legacy key, replaced by wave-modifier. Background opacity is now per-design.

key.name: wave-modifier
key.description: Controls visual effects intensity such as shadow trail (0=none, 100=maximum)

key.name: wave-position
key.description: Position of the waveform widget on screen

key.name: reaction-time
key.description: How often the waveform bars update in milliseconds

key.name: wave-smoothing
key.description: How smooth the bar animations are (0=jumpy, 100=very smooth)

key.name: wave-sensitivity
key.description: How much the bars react to sound (50=low, 300=very high)

key.name: wave-width
key.description: Width of the waveform widget as percentage of base (50-500%)

key.name: wave-height
key.description: Height of the waveform widget as percentage of base (50-500%)

key.name: wave-pos-x
key.description: Horizontal position as fraction of usable screen width (0.0=left, 1.0=right)

key.name: wave-pos-y
key.description: Vertical position as fraction of usable screen height (0.0=top, 1.0=bottom)

key.name: enter-after-paste
key.description: Automatically press Enter after pasting transcribed text

key.name: enter-after-paste-delay
key.description: How long to wait after paste before pressing Enter (100-5000ms)

key.name: transcription-model
key.description: Model used for post-processing transcription (Ctrl+Super+C, Ctrl+Super+D)

key.name: realtime-model
key.description: Model used for realtime streaming transcription (Ctrl+Super+V)

key.name: shortcut-cancel
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to cancel the current recording

key.name: shortcut-realtime
key.description: Keyboard shortcut for realtime voice recording

key.name: shortcut-post-autopaste
key.description: Keyboard shortcut for post-processing with auto-paste

key.name: shortcut-post-router
key.description: Keyboard shortcut for post-processing with router
